name: Excalibur
summary: Excalibur is a 1983 resource-management strategy video game for the Atari 8-bit family. It was designed by Chris Crawford and developed with the help of Larry Summers and Valerie Atkinson. Like Crawford's earlier Eastern Front (1941), Excalibur was published by the Atari Program Exchange.
info:
• 开发: Chris Crawford
  • 发行: Atari Program Exchange
  • 遊戲設計師: Chris Crawford
  • 程序: Chris Crawford, Larry Summers, Valerie Atkinson
  • 平台: Atari 400/800
  • 游戏类型: SLG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1983年秋
  • 游戏设计师: Chris Crawford
